sentences.en: " I don't see where your wrath comes in.
sentences.cn: “ 我不明白你的怒气是从哪里来的.

sentences.en: Babbitt had recovered form his touchy wrath before Joe returned.
sentences.cn: 乔回来之前,巴比特莫名其妙的怒气已经平息.

sentences.en: By their sin they provoked the wrath of the people.
sentences.cn: 他们因犯罪而激起人民的愤怒.

sentences.en: He incurred Helen's wrath by arriving late.
sentences.cn: 他迟到了,惹得海伦发了火.

sentences.en: He was scared of incurring his father’s wrath .
sentences.cn: 他害怕惹他父亲大发脾气。

sentences.en: Her wrath would never wreak itself in one fell blow.
sentences.cn: 她不会让她的怒气一古脑儿发泄出来.
他的沉默表明了他的愤怒。

sentences.en: In the Catholic cathedral, the athlete shouted out his wrath in the athletic oath.
sentences.cn: 在天主教大教堂，选手在体育誓言中喊出了他义愤。

sentences.en: She calls down God's wrath on him.
The bells were not enough to stay the wrath of the saints.
sentences.cn: 钟声已经不足以平息圣徒们的怒气了.

sentences.en: The children's unruly behaviour incurred the headteacher's wrath.
sentences.cn: 小学生不守规矩惹得校长发怒.

sentences.en: The old man opened the floodgates of wrath.
The tigers of wrath are wiser than the horses of instruction.
sentences.cn: 愤怒的猛虎比训导过的马匹聪明.

sentences.en: The wrath of summer's heat has enveloped the valley.
sentences.cn: 夏日的酷暑已经笼罩了山谷.

sentences.en: The wrath of the people is now aroused.

phrases.tran_cn: 神的忿怒；神之愤怒；上帝的惩罚
